item.title: CH32V30x Guide - From 8051 to RISC-V
item.description:
Introduction

This is a CH32V30x RISC-V MCU learning guide designed for 8051 developers.

If you have experience with 8051 MCU development and want to transition to RISC-V architecture, this guide will help you quickly get started with the CH32V30x series.

Contents

  • RISC-V Architecture Overview
  • CH32V30x Series Introduction
  • Migration Guide from 8051 to RISC-V
  • Development Environment Setup
  • Practical Examples
